name: Review 2
instruction: Match each word with its definition.
instruction_vi: Nối từ với định nghĩa của nó.

answers.definition: something that you carry in your pocket for holding money, bank cards, etc. Usually for men.
transportation; carrying people and things from one place to another
with no people or things inside
a room or building where you go to borrow or read books
movie theater; a place where people pay to watch films
a competition to see who can run, ride, drive, etc., the fastest
a strong building that keeps an important place safe
to send someone a written message on a mobile phone
railway station; a place where trains stop for people to get on and off
clothes that you wear, especially to parties, to make you look like a famous person, a character from a story, etc.
a place where you go to study for a degree after you have left high school or college
